name: my_world{died}: Artificial Ecosystem
description:
CURRENTLY ONLY THE DEMO IS AVAILABLE. EXPECTED FULL RELEASE SCHEDULED AFTER THE FULL COMPLETION OF THE LIVING EVERYTHING.

Past and future. Before the apocalypse, after the apocalypse. 2022. 2082. Two different time periods are forced to cooperate between one another in order to prevent a catastrophe.

One doesn't know anything about an apocalypse, and the other doesn't know its cause. Will their combined effort help in preventing the world-ending event in the first place?

Take the role of either a programmer or a sentient motorcycle in this time-travel adventure and help solve the mystery by hacking into devices using various puzzles.

Demo created for Bird Jam 2022.
